Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;hops^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

For the next steps you'll need some ^orange;Hops^reset;. I think you can buy some seeds at ^orange;Terramart^reset;. Make them grow and gather at least 2 ^orange;Hops^reset;. Because without ^orange;hops^reset;, we get no ^green;beer^reset;. And without beer we cry.

Texts.Chs: 这是一个好的开始。请务必收集一些小麦，因为你下一步会需要到它。
Texts.Eng: That's a good start. Be sure to keep some wheat as you'll need it next.
